title: Black screen of death on mac
body: So Ever since this update I keep getting a black screen during the loading screen where you see all the champs your about to play against. I cant do anything and it just shows my cursor. Im currently running on a mac and ive never had problems with league. Its always ran perfectly fine for me.

replies.body: me too! i tried everything.. after champion select screen turns black and all I see is my mac cursor (not the league cursor) then it crashes and I click reconnect and it does the same thing.
yea i know it sucks it happend since the 6.1 update

Hey Alan and Languishing,

We've noticed that a couple of players using the Razer Kraken headset have been experiencing similar issues (black screen when the loading screen should come up). Are you two using that headset? If so, could you attempt to unplug the headset and see if you can load into a custom game?

Thanks!
I have a razer kraken headset too! This happened to me! When I put it on it doesn't work. I took it off and did custom but it still does not work.

Im experiencing the same issue as stated above. I don't  think it has something to do with the razor headset though, I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game but nothing happened. Please look into this problem. Thanks Riot problems hope you fix this problem soon thank you{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Hey Moortin, 

What operating system version are you currently running? This can happen if your OS is out of date. Check out [this guide](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201541) to make sure your computer is up to date.

If that doesn't work, I recommend you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our Tech Support guys can help resolve this crash for you!
